short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expands all Actual Results and adds As Expected as a comment, also adding WorkflowID if appropriate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension expands all steps in a test case and adds configured instructions in the actual result(that are set in the extension settings) based on words/phrases found in the execution instructions(i.e. if the instruction is to "Record Transaction Date in many steps, you can configure the extension to set a template for that, using the current day, like 01-Jan-2020)
